document.full_text: the rising mississippi river lapped over downtown memphis streets on thursday as a massive wall of water threatened to unleash near record flooding all the way to the gulf of mexico.
document.title: mississippi floods force evacuations near memphis
lines_and_colors: the rising mississippi river lapped over downtown memphis streets on thursday as a massive wall of water threatened to unleash near record flooding all the way to the gulf of mexico.
